twitter.title: Got Twitter?
twitter.description: Does your team (or prominent team member have a twitter username or hashtag? Include @ or #, respectively.

racer-type.title: What type of team are you?
racer-type.description: Most teams should choose racer. See the construction rules for guidance. We love art carts and you should to, but you do have to present something super rad.

buddies.title: Did you want to race alongside any other teams or people? Who?
buddies.description: We can't guarantee anything, but we'll try to have you run together. Choosing this removes your sabotage privileges and your ability to win any time prizes.

shower-song.title: What's your favorite song to sing in the shower?
shower-song.description: No one's looking. Go ahead, tell us.

primary-inspiration.title: What is your primary inspiration for racing CHIditarod?
primary-inspiration.description: Your answer helps us improve the event. We remain unbiased, as always.
enum: Doing a good thing but doing it all wrong

agree-to-rules.title: Did you read and will you follow the race rules?
agree-to-rules.description: Ahem, this also means, do you understand you can be DQ'd if you do not pay attention to all the rules? They change every year. Reading the F.A.Q. will make you a better racer, and more attractive.

agree-to-sabotage.title: Have you read and agreed to the sabotage rules?
agree-to-sabotage.description: To review: The sabotage rules are indeed rules. Don't spoil anyone's day by being a jerk and getting DQ'd.

agree-to-cart-deposit.title: Have you read and agreed to the cart deposit rules?
agree-to-cart-deposit.description: Make sure you read the rules; they are new and expanded this year (including potential for overnight parking).

agree-to-cart-food-poundage.title: Do you agree to bring 65+ pounds of food?
agree-to-cart-food-poundage.description: This year's mimumum is 65 lbs, but don't stop there! You must bring your food to the starting line check-in. If you plan on raising GOBS of food, contact us for special arrangements to make your life easier.

agree-not-a-donation.title: Do you understand the nature of your registration fee?
agree-not-a-donation.description: The money you're paying is a fee to participate in the CHIditarod, not a donation to the Foundation.

agree-to-orientation.title: Do you agree to attend the pre-race orientation?
agree-to-orientation.description: This year it is mandatory that one of the 5 racers from your team attends the racer orientation meeting. If a team fails to attend this meeting, you are NOT ALLOWED to race. If you live far away (100 miles or more), please email us and we will make other arrangements. The mandatory racer meeting is on Saturday February 28th at Phyllis Musical Inn, 1800 West Division Street, Chicago, IL 60622. Two sessions are available -- 12:00 pm or 2 pm.

party-bus-interest.title: Shuttle Bus Interest
party-bus-interest.description: We are hiring buses to take teams (not carts) from the finish line to the awards ceremony (yep, they are separate this year). How interested is your team in riding the shuttle from the finish line to the awards ceremony? This is a one-way trip, meaning you will have to get your own transportation back to the finish line (but itâ€™s not very far).

party-bus-seats.title: Shuttle Bus Seats
party-bus-seats.description: How many seats do you want reserved? Please be as accurate as possible so we rent the right number of busses. If you do not reserve a seat, you are not guaranteed a spot.

form.title: Let's get to know each other

items.helpvalue: If you see a red error like String does match pattern, it means 'you did not agree and cannot pass! Choose again.

items.inlinetitle: I understand that my registration fees are not a donation to the foundation.
